abstract: Game 1 of American League division series between New York Yankees and Detroit Tigers is suspended because of heavy rain; rain outs are nothing new to the Yankees, who had nine games suspended during the regular season due to bad weather.
snippet: After having 22 games affected by weather this season, the Yankees opened the postseason with a game that was suspended because of heavy rain.
lead_paragraph: After having 22 games affected by weather this season, the Yankees opened the postseason with a game that was suspended because of heavy rain.

headline.main: Yanks Pick Up Where They Left Off: In Weather Delay
headline.print_headline: Yanks Pick Up Where They Left Off: In Weather Delay
headline.seo: Yankees-Tigers Game Suspended by Rain; Will Pick Up Saturday
